name: Forecasting Demand - Business User App
description: Forecasting Demand at Product Level using time series trained models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Forecasting Demand at Product Level

Overview

This app enables business users to forecast product-level demand using cutting-edge time-series forecasting models like Prophet and SARIMAX. By analyzing historical sales patterns, the app helps optimize inventory, reduce stockouts, and improve strategic planning for growth and customer satisfaction.

Input

  • +Forecast interval
  • + Number of months to forecast
  • + Products

Output

  • + Forecasted Sales: Predicted demand over the selected time window
  • + Confidence Intervals: 95% confidence bounds included
  • + Model Comparison Visuals: Compare performance of different models
  • + Prediction Reports: Easy-to-understand summaries for business users
  • + Forecasting insights using GenAI

Benefits

  • + Operational Efficiency: Enables optimal inventory planning and resource allocation
  • + Customer Satisfaction: Reduces stockouts and improves service delivery
  • + Strategic Growth: Informs long-term initiatives like new product launches
  • + Actionable Insights: Risk-aware planning through forecast uncertainty
  • + Ease of Use: Designed for business users with an intuitive interface
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
Product Category The identifier or name of the product category where the products was sold.
Product Name The identifier or name of the item sold.
Total_Quantity_Sold The total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.
